dict.string: "${TM_RUBY:-ruby}" -r "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/bin/shelltokenize.rb" <<END xcode_project = ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT'] + "/bin/xcode_project.rb" project_file = %x{"${TM_RUBY:-ruby}" -- "${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/bin/find_xcode_project.rb"}.strip adds = TextMate.selected_paths_for_shell.split(" ").collect{|path| "add=" + path} command = "\"#{xcode_project}\" \"project=#{project_file}\" #{adds.join(" ")}" puts %x{#{command}} #puts command END
